version.changed: Merged templates into only one template project.
Upgraded project templates to new structure.
Updated bin folder readme.txt to explain the different batch files.
Extracted the GamePlugin IMPEXP macro to separate header file, so that other projects can correctly import classes and data from the plugin
Added VS2010 configurations for all projects. Please also take a look at the README.txt in the project folders, since this fix introduced some other minor changes. [HS #4471]
version.added: Added changelog, thus starting to track changes.
